full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL SRAS ZHE BRGYAD KYI RNAM BZHAG MDOR BSDUS SNYING POR SGREL PA BDUD RTZI'I BUM BZANG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B CES RGYAL SRAS ZHE BRGYAD KYI RNAM BZHAG MDOR BSDUS SNYING POR SGRIL PA BDUD RTZI'I BUM BZANG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI NYI KHRI DANG SBYAR ZHING KHUNGS NGAG CING SHIN TU DGON PA 'DI NI, GLONG LO DANG, RTA LO GNYIS LA DAD LDAN CHOS KYI SPYAN YANGS SLOB MA MANG POS NAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR, MDO SNGAGS SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR DBU PHAR SOGS GZHUNG LUGS RNAMS LA NYAMS MYONG CUNG ZAD YOD PA, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG GU RU KA WA BHA DRA BRANYDZ'A ZHES BYA BAS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,AOm SVA STI, TSUL 'DI TSE LDAN BSOD NAMS GUNG GI SHOG ,LHAG BSAM DAD PAS CHOS 'PHEL ZHES BYA GYIS, ,CHOS SBYIN RGYA CHER SPEL BAS 'GAL RKYEN SEL, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE DPAR DU LEGS PAR BSGRUBS, RNAM SAD 'DIS MTSON DUS GSUM DGE TSOGS MTHUS, ,TSE RABS KUN TU DAL 'BYOR RTEN BRGYUD DE, ,THEG MCHOG BLA MAS DGYES BZHIN RJES BZUNG NAS, ,SA LAM BGROD PA MYUR DU MTHAR PHYIN SHOG ,DPAR RKO BA PA DGE TSUL TSUL KHRIMS KYIS DPAR BSGRU, 'DI KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
author_simple: GU RU KA WA BHA DRA BRANYDZ'A,
